product.name: Microchip Dev Board
product.description: Satisfy your curiosity with a microchip dev board. This board includes an I/O interface, Intergrated programmer and debugger, 8/16/32-bit MCUs, Connectivity options, User interfaces and more.

product.name: Raspberry Pi 4
product.description: The Raspberry Pi 4 is a tiny desktop computer which can be used for anything you can think of, the possibilities are endless from application development in python to operating system modification.

product.name: Sony PS4 Pro
product.description: The sony PS4 is the best selling console of the current generation and the pro takes the console to another level. The console boasts increased processing power and the ability to output at 4K resolution.
